name: The Negative Mind
description:
This is a game where you are a fire of positive thoughts and have to go against a lot of enemies. This game  was made for the Blackthronprod game jam. This game was inspired by the fire of belief a lot.

My Youtube channel with many tutorials : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCydR_7BsEO--NyVv6-YlnJg
